hadiths.text: Narrated Umm Salamah, Ummul Mu'minin: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) taught me to say when the adhan for the sunset prayer was called; "O Allah, this is the time when Thy night comes on, Thy day retires, and the voices of Thy summoners are heard, so forgive me

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقُولُ عِنْدَ أَذَانِ الْمَغْرِبِ
chapter.eng-name: What Should Be Said For The Maghrib Adhan
